name: Craft'Em Up!
description:
Craft your way up to the golden shrine using the resources you collect on your way up!

However, since the crafting mechanic is incomplete, do feel free to use the red carpets to warp back and forth between islands!

Made for JamCraft 2 using GameMaker:Studio and Blender.

Controls
  • WSAD/ZSQD - Move
  • Escape - End game / Exit menu / Return to game
  • Tab - Toggle inventory
  • Mouse wheel scroll - Change zoom level / change part to create (in menus)
  • Left mouse button - Rotate / Re-center camera on player, interact (in menus)

For all other things, just run into them to open their respective menu or to pick them up.

Credits

All coding, graphics and music by Bart Teunis

Sound effects from freesfx.co.uk (sound-ideas)
